cause.description:
This Cause is to help out the CFX program back at Xavier. To support the program that gave us so many good memories and lessons on life.
1. Help Campus Ministry Raise money for the trips
2. Show that Alums of the program still show support even though we are not an everyday presence
3. Help expand CFX online
cause.mission: Help support the CFX program in Xavier
cause.name: Xavier CFX Alum Support
